title: Peanuts Brand Acquired By Sony In $457 Million Deal

facts.content_line: Sony Music Entertainment Japan and Sony Pictures Entertainment agreed to acquire WildBrain’s 41% stake in Peanuts Holdings LLC for CAN$630 million, roughly $457 million U.S.
summary_bullets: Sony Music Entertainment Japan and Sony Pictures Entertainment agreed to acquire WildBrain’s 41% stake in Peanuts Holdings LLC for CAN$630 million, roughly $457 million U.S.

facts.content_line: After the transaction closes, Sony will own approximately 80% of Peanuts Holdings while the Schulz family will retain its current 20% stake
summary_bullets: After the transaction closes, Sony will own approximately 80% of Peanuts Holdings while the Schulz family will retain its current 20% stake

facts.content_line: Peanuts Holdings and Peanuts Worldwide will become consolidated subsidiaries of the Sony Group with Sony Music taking lead management of Peanuts Holdings in partnership with Sony Pictures Entertainment
summary_bullets: Peanuts Holdings and Peanuts Worldwide will become consolidated subsidiaries of the Sony Group with Sony Music taking lead management of Peanuts Holdings in partnership with Sony Pictures Entertainment

facts.content_line: Ownership of Peanuts rights and day-to-day management will continue to be handled by Peanuts Worldwide as a wholly owned subsidiary of Peanuts Holdings
summary_bullets: Ownership of Peanuts rights and day-to-day management will continue to be handled by Peanuts Worldwide as a wholly owned subsidiary of Peanuts Holdings

facts.content_line: Sony framed the deal as a strategic move to elevate the Peanuts brand globally by leveraging the Sony Group’s network and expertise to reach new audiences and protect the franchise legacy
summary_bullets: Sony framed the deal as a strategic move to elevate the Peanuts brand globally by leveraging the Sony Group’s network and expertise to reach new audiences and protect the franchise legacy

facts.content_line: WildBrain will remain the exclusive consumer products licensing agent through WildBrain CPLG in its current territories across Europe, the Middle East, China, and Asia Pacific excluding Japan and ANZ
summary_bullets: WildBrain will remain the exclusive consumer products licensing agent through WildBrain CPLG in its current territories across Europe, the Middle East, China, and Asia Pacific excluding Japan and ANZ

facts.content_line: WildBrain will remain the exclusive production studio for new Peanuts content, including a previously announced feature film, under an expanded partnership with Apple TV that has been renewed through 2030
summary_bullets: WildBrain will remain the exclusive production studio for new Peanuts content, including a previously announced feature film, under an expanded partnership with Apple TV that has been renewed through 2030

facts.content_line: WildBrain will continue to distribute WildBrain-produced Peanuts content and manage the Snoopy YouTube channel under the new ownership structure
summary_bullets: WildBrain will continue to distribute WildBrain-produced Peanuts content and manage the Snoopy YouTube channel under the new ownership structure

facts.content_line: WildBrain plans to use proceeds from the sale to eliminate debt, accelerate growth of its Strawberry Shortcake and Teletubbies franchises, and invest in its digital content network across YouTube, FAST and AVOD channels
summary_bullets: WildBrain plans to use proceeds from the sale to eliminate debt, accelerate growth of its Strawberry Shortcake and Teletubbies franchises, and invest in its digital content network across YouTube, FAST and AVOD channels

facts.content_line: The transaction follows WildBrain’s acquisition of Peanuts rights in 2017 when DHX Media bought Iconix Brand Group, and maintains an ongoing multi-stakeholder partnership among Sony, WildBrain, and the Schulz family
summary_bullets: The transaction follows WildBrain’s acquisition of Peanuts rights in 2017 when DHX Media bought Iconix Brand Group, and maintains an ongoing multi-stakeholder partnership among Sony, WildBrain, and the Schulz family

facts.content_line: Apple TV remains the exclusive streaming home for Peanuts under a rights deal extended in 2020 that includes new series, specials, and an animated feature from the team behind the 2015 The Peanuts Movie
summary_bullets: Apple TV remains the exclusive streaming home for Peanuts under a rights deal extended in 2020 that includes new series, specials, and an animated feature from the team behind the 2015 The Peanuts Movie

title: Freddie Highmore To Star In Rom-Com 'Life On Other Planets' From Pat Cunnane

facts.content_line: Life on Other Planets: Sony Pictures, romantic comedy
summary_bullets: Life on Other Planets: Sony Pictures, romantic comedy
Sony is targeting a streaming release.

facts.content_line: Augustine & Edgar: Gaumont/TF1, Edgar Allen Poe series
summary_bullets: Augustine & Edgar: Gaumont/TF1, Edgar Allen Poe series
From Gaumont and TF1, it will mark Highmore's French-language acting debut.

facts.content_line: Eternity: A24/Star Thrower Entertainment, drama film
summary_bullets: Eternity: A24/Star Thrower Entertainment, drama film
Produced for A24 by Star Thrower Entertainment.
